Desc.entry: Provides activities during school holidays for young people aged 13-19 years (may include 12 year olds in the future) with learning disabilities and also works with youth participation groups.

ContactName.entry: Vicki Ambler/Julie Melville/Jeanette Snell, Assistant Manager

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9.30am-4pm (office times); 10am-3pm (activity times), all school holidays except Christmas, please contact for details

category.entry: LEARNING DISABILITIES - ORGANISATIONS FOR PEOPLE WITH
